title: Mordekaiser Bug
body:
Hi all, 

Been noticing this for days now, I have not been able to find the cause however it seems to have someething to do with the items Hextech Protobelt, Rylais and Liandry's. Everytime i have this build my W becomes invisible at some point. I cannot tell if this is based on having one item, a combination of items, being cc'd while casting or the time of the game however I thought this needed to be brought up as it needs a fix :) 

While I can still hear it when it is active and re-activate it this is annoying for my allies who arent watching my shield when I cast it, it even becomes difficult for me in a teamfight  where I alt+w and then I cannot tell who the shield paired with. 

Please look into this.

Regards,
Me.
